nodes.text: Paouoish Rahhdool was a male Jedi Master serving the Galactic Republic as part of the Jedi Order prior to the Clone Wars. He discovered the infant Shistavanen Voolvif Monn abandoned on a world near the Arah asteroid belt. Rahdool took Monn as his Padawan and trained him to hone his tracking abilities and hunter instincts with his innate Force skills to become a fearsome opponent in combat. In time, Monn also became a Jedi Master.
Paouoish Rahhdool was first mentioned in the StarWars.com Databank entry of his pupil Voolvif Monn. Later, he received an entry in the 2008 compendium The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia.
